name: Gym page
description: It's an example landing page about a gym. It's divided by 4 sections: Hero, Services, Testimonials.

name: Pizza page
description: It's an example landing page about an pizza restaurant. It's divided by 4 sections: Hero, About and Foods.

name: Architecture page
description: It's an example landing page about an architecture agency. It's divided by 4 sections: Hero, About, Services and Projects.

name: Tasks App
description: I am currently working on an application for task management. You can view, add, edit and delete tasks. I developed it with React, the Javascript library. This application has data persistence, which is the Local Storage.

name: Countdown
description: It is a project that shows the countdown of the date preset by the user with respect to the current time.

name: Filter images gallery
description: It is a project that filters images according to their name. These images are brought from the Pixabay API.
